Package com.ultreon.bubbles.bubble

Class BubbleProperties

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.common.EntityPos
com.ultreon.bubbles.bubble.BubbleProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BubbleProperties extends EntityPos
Bubble properties, used for Gamemode objects / classes, and used by BubbleRandomizer for returning the randomized bubble properties.
See Also:
  • BubbleRandomizer
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • BubbleProperties

      public BubbleProperties(BubbleType type, float damageValue, double speed, int radius, int x, int y, Environment environment, Rng rng)
      Bubble properties: Constructor.
      Parameters:
      type - the bubble type.
      damageValue - the bubble hardness.
      speed - the bubble speed.
      radius - the bubble radius.
      x - the bubble x coordinate.
      y - the bubble y coordinate.
      environment - the game environment.

    • BubbleProperties

      public BubbleProperties(BubbleType type, float damageValue, double speed, int radius, int x, int y, Environment environment, Rng rng, Rng bubbleRng)
      Bubble properties: Constructor.
      Parameters:
      type - the bubble type.
      damageValue - the bubble hardness.
      speed - the bubble speed.
      radius - the bubble radius.
      x - the bubble x coordinate.
      y - the bubble y coordinate.
      environment - the game-type where the randomizing would be used.
      rng - the RNG for the bubble to generate unsolved values.

    • BubbleProperties

      public BubbleProperties(BubbleType type, float damageValue, double speed, int radius, int x, int y, float defense, float attack, float score, Rng rng)
      Bubble properties: Constructor/
      Parameters:
      type - the bubble type.
      damageValue - the bubble hardness.
      speed - the bubble speed.
      radius - the bubble radius.
      x - the bubble x coordinate.
      y - the bubble y coordinate.
      defense - the bubble defense value.
      attack - the bubble attack value.
      score - the bubble score value.
